location.zh-cn: 广州市越秀区府前路1号
location.en: No. 1 Fuqian Road, Yuexiu District, Guangzhou

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国广东省广州市的地方国家行政机关。1955年2月至1968年2月间曾改称广州市人民委员会，文化大革命期间职权由广州市革命委员会行使，1981年9月恢复广州市人民政府名称至今。
description.en: The local state administrative organ of Guangzhou City, Guangdong Province, People's Republic of China. It was renamed the Guangzhou Municipal People's Committee between February 1955 and February 1968. During the Cultural Revolution, its powers were exercised by the Guangzhou Revolutionary Committee. The name Guangzhou Municipal People's Government was restored in September 1981.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，现任广州市人民政府市长。
description.en: Chinese politician, current Mayor of the Guangzhou Municipal People's Government.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，现任广州市人民政府秘书长。
description.en: Chinese politician, current Secretary-General of the Guangzhou Municipal People's Government.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国广东省的省级国家行政机关。
description.en: The provincial-level state administrative organ of Guangdong Province, People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国广东省广州市的地方国家权力机关。
description.en: The local state power organ of Guangzhou City, Guangdong Province, People's Republic of China.

nodes.id: 广州市人民代表大会常务委员会

zh-cn: 广州市人民代表大会常务委员会

description.zh-cn: 广州市人民代表大会的常设机关。
description.en: The standing body of the Guangzhou Municipal People's Congress.

nodes.id: 中国共产党广州市委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党广州市委员会

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在广州市的领导机关。
description.en: The leading organ of the Communist Party of China in Guangzhou City.

nodes.id: 中国人民解放军广州市军事管制委员会

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军广州市军事管制委员会

description.zh-cn: 1949年中国人民解放军进驻广州后成立的临时权力机构，负责接管旧政权。
description.en: A temporary authority established after the Chinese People's Liberation Army entered Guangzhou in 1949, responsible for taking over the old regime.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国大陆时期广州市的地方政权机关。
description.en: The local government authority of Guangzhou during the period of the Republic of China on the mainland.

nodes.id: 中国人民解放军第四野战军

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军第四野战军

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军在第二次国共内战时期的主力部队之一。
description.en: One of the main forces of the Chinese People's Liberation Army during the second phase of the Chinese Civil War.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国中央人民政府

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国中央人民政府

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的中央政府。
description.en: The central government of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国成立初期的一级行政区。
description.en: A first-level administrative division in the early days of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国历史上的一场政治运动。
description.en: A political movement in the history of the People's Republic of China.

zh-cn: 广东省广州市革命委员会

description.zh-cn: 文化大革命期间广州市的最高权力机关，行使原市委、市人大、市人委的职权。
description.en: The highest authority in Guangzhou during the Cultural Revolution, exercising the powers of the former Municipal Party Committee, Municipal People's Congress, and Municipal People's Committee.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国时期军事将领，曾主政广东。
description.en: A military general during the Republic of China era who once governed Guangdong.

description.zh-cn: 广州市人民政府主要机关驻地建筑。
description.en: The main office building of the Guangzhou Municipal People's Government.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国吉林省下辖的县级市。
description.en: A county-level city under the jurisdiction of Jilin Province, People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 广州市人民政府在业务上由广东省人民政府领导。
description.en: The Guangzhou Municipal People's Government is operationally led by the Guangdong Provincial People's Government.

description.zh-cn: 广州市人民政府由广州市人民代表大会产生，对其负责并受其监督。
description.en: The Guangzhou Municipal People's Government is formed by, responsible to, and supervised by the Guangzhou Municipal People's Congress.

relationships.target: 广州市人民代表大会常务委员会

description.zh-cn: 广州市人民政府对广州市人民代表大会常务委员会负责并受其监督。
description.en: The Guangzhou Municipal People's Government is responsible to and supervised by the Standing Committee of the Guangzhou Municipal People's Congress.

relationships.target: 中国共产党广州市委员会

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党广州市委员会是广州市人民政府的中共上级组织。
description.en: The Guangzhou Municipal Committee of the Communist Party of China is the superior CPC organization to the Guangzhou Municipal People's Government.

relationships.source: 中国人民解放军第四野战军
relationships.target: 中国人民解放军广州市军事管制委员会

description.zh-cn: 1949年10月14日，中国人民解放军第四野战军进驻广州后，于10月21日成立了中国人民解放军广州市军事管制委员会。
description.en: After the Fourth Field Army of the PLA entered Guangzhou on October 14, 1949, it established the Guangzhou Military Control Commission of the Chinese People's Liberation Army on October 21.

relationships.source: 中国人民解放军广州市军事管制委员会

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军广州市军事管制委员会接管了原中华民国广州市政府。
description.en: The Guangzhou Military Control Commission of the Chinese People's Liberation Army took over the former Guangzhou Municipal Government of the Republic of China.

relationships.source: 中国人民解放军广州市军事管制委员会

description.zh-cn: 在军事管制委员会成立后，于1949年10月28日正式成立广州市人民政府。
description.en: After the establishment of the Military Control Commission, the Guangzhou Municipal People's Government was formally established on October 28, 1949.

description.zh-cn: 文化大革命爆发后，于1968年2月成立了广州市革命委员会。
description.en: After the outbreak of the Cultural Revolution, the Guangzhou Revolutionary Committee was established in February 1968.

description.zh-cn: 广州市革命委员会成立后，行使原中共广州市委、市人大、市人委的职权，直至1981年恢复广州市人民政府。
description.en: After its establishment, the Guangzhou Revolutionary Committee exercised the powers of the former Municipal Party Committee, Municipal People's Congress, and Municipal People's Committee (then name for the government), until the Guangzhou Municipal People's Government was restored in 1981.

relationships.target: 中国人民解放军广州市军事管制委员会

description.zh-cn: 在广州市人民政府改称为广州市人民委员会期间任市长。
description.en: Served as mayor during the period when the Guangzhou Municipal People's Government was renamed the Guangzhou Municipal People's Committee.

description.zh-cn: 在广州市人民政府改称为广州市人民委员会期间任市长。
description.en: Served as mayor during the period when the Guangzhou Municipal People's Government was renamed the Guangzhou Municipal People's Committee.

description.zh-cn: 广州市政府合署在陈济棠主政广东时期建成。
description.en: The Guangzhou Municipal Government Complex was built during the period when Chen Jitang governed Guangdong.
